create.title: Night of the Living Dead
create.overview: A group of people trapped in a farmhouse must survive the night as the dead rise and feast on the living.

duplicate.title: Dawn of the Dead
duplicate.overview: Survivors of a zombie outbreak take refuge in a shopping mall, but soon face external and internal threats.

movie_3.title: 28 Days Later
movie_3.overview: A man wakes up from a coma to find London overrun by a rage-fueled virus, forcing him to fight for survival.

movie_4.title: Shaun of the Dead
movie_4.overview: A slacker and his best friend attempt to survive a zombie apocalypse while trying to win back his ex-girlfriend.

movie_5.title: Train to Busan
movie_5.overview: Passengers on a high-speed train struggle to survive as a zombie outbreak spreads throughout South Korea.

movie_6.title: Zombieland
movie_6.overview: A group of survivors navigate a zombie-infested America using their own set of survival rules.

movie_7.title: World War Z
movie_7.overview: A former UN investigator races against time to stop a global zombie pandemic from consuming humanity.

movie_8.title: REC
movie_8.overview: A reporter and her cameraman find themselves trapped in an apartment building during a terrifying viral outbreak.

movie_9.title: The Return of the Living Dead
movie_9.overview: A punk group faces a horde of brain-hungry zombies after a toxic gas is accidentally released in a cemetery.

movie_10.title: Resident Evil
movie_10.overview: A team of elite soldiers fights to contain a deadly viral outbreak in an underground lab, facing hordes of zombies.
